name: AioS undocked floating sidebar
description: Undocks the All in One Sidebar (AioS), so floats over page content
additional_info:
This style disables this #sidebar-splitter functionality, so only way to change the width is from the options menu (Options/General/Appearance) & it only uses the minimum width setting, ignoring normal & maximum settings 

also if you prefer a fancier undocking style found on userstyles, but part of the toolbars transparent in AioS, can just add the #aios-toolbar snippet from this code to fix it

Btw if not entirely dependent on every feature of AioS, have a look at Omni Sidebar instead, its alot easier to use imo, and has an undock feature built in which also comes with resizer, and dual sidebars if you want it
